${ModID}:Concatenation.NAME: Concatenation
${ModID}:Concatenation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Doppel with the leftmost Attack in your hand.

${ModID}:EmergencyContact.NAME: Emergency Contact
${ModID}:EmergencyContact.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Summon {@@}{!M!|1=a|@=!M!} ${ModID}:Doppel{!M!|0,>1=s} with {!M!|1=a card|@=!M! cards} in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GrandfatherParadox.NAME: Grandfather Paradox
${ModID}:GrandfatherParadox.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Summon {@@}{!M!|1=a|@=!M!} ${ModID}:Doppel{!M!|0,>1=s} with {!M!|1=a card|@=!M! cards} in your discard pile. NL Gain [E] equal to {!M!|1=its|@=their} cost. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Resistance.NAME: Resistance
${ModID}:Resistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Doppel with the leftmost Skill in your hand.

${ModID}:Tides.NAME: Tides
${ModID}:Tides.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Deal !D! damage for each ${ModID}:Doppel. NL ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Doppel.

${ModID}:Turbulence.NAME: Turbulence
${ModID}:Turbulence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Doppel, trigger its passive ability{@@}{!M!|1=|2= twice|@= !M! times}.

${ModID}:Vortex.NAME: Vortex
${ModID}:Vortex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you haven't played this card this turn, ${ModID}:Summon a ${ModID}:Doppel with this card.

${ModID}:WormHole.NAME: Worm Hole
${ModID}:WormHole.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Strength or Dexterity increases damage or Block of ${ModID}:Doppels accordingly.
